title: Integration latency report
description: Create API Gateway integration latency report for your API Gateway access log group.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: Cloudwatch Log Insight snippet that returns API Gateway integration latency statistics in 1 minute intervals in your API Gateway access log group.

snippets.title: Copy the code into CloudWatch Logs Insights

authors.headline: Presented by Eric Johnson
authors.name: Eric Johnson
authors.bio: Eric Johnson is a Principal Developer Advocate for Serverless Applications at Amazon Web Services and is based in Northern Colorado. Eric is a fanatic about serverless and enjoys helping developers understand how serverless technologies introduces a major paradigm shift in how they approach building and running applications at massive scale with minimal administration overhead. Prior to this, Eric has worked as a developer, solutions architect and AWS Evangelist for an AWS partner company.
